msg: Removed the finish method from Action interface as I don't see a use for it.

author: ceki
msg: - Implicit actions now work for SAX based element handling.

author: ceki
msg: The Locator object can be retreived through the ExecutionContext. No need
to carry it along in the Action.begin method

author: ceki
msg: Joran actions now report the location of the error in the xml file being parsed.
